import {useState,useContext} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Container, Form, Button, Toast} from 'react-bootstrap' import AlertaContext from '../../context/alertas/alertaContext' import './NuevaCuenta.css' const NuevaCuenta = () => { const alertaContext = useContext(AlertaContext) const {alerta, mostrarAlerta} = alertaContext const [usuario, guardarUsuario] = useState({ email : '', password : '', confirmpassword : '', name : '' }) const {email, password, confirmpassword, name} = usuario const onChange = e =>{ guardarUsuario({ ...usuario, [e.target.name] : e.target.value }) } const onSubmit = e =>{ e.preventDefault() if(email.trim() === '' || password.trim() === '' || confirmpassword === '' || name.trim() === '') return if(password.trim() !== confirmpassword.trim()) return console.log(usuario) } return (
Bootstrap just now See? Just like this. Bootstrap 2 seconds ago Heads up, toasts will stack automatically

Crear nueva cuenta

 ); } export default NuevaCuenta;
